sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'
import MyDropdown from './MyDropdown'
import axios from 'axios'

export default function NewRecordForm(){
  const genderList = ['Male', 'Female', 'Other']
  const bloodGroupList = ['A+', 'A-', 'B+', 'B-', 'AB+', 'AB-', 'O+', 'O-']

  const [form, setForm] = useState({})
  const [errors, setErrors] = useState({})

  function fillForm(key, value){
    setForm({
      ...form,
      [key] : value
    })

    setErrors({
      ...er
    })
  }
  

  function formSubmit(event){
    event.preventDefault();
    
  }


  return (
    <Form onSubmit={formSubmit}>
      <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formBasicEmail">
        <Form.Label>ID</Form.Label>
        <Form.Control type="number" placeholder="ID" onChange={(e)=>{setForm('ID', e.target.value)}}/>
      </Form.Group>

      <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formBasicEmail">
        <Form.Label>Name</Form.Label>
        <Form.Control required type="text" placeholder="Name" onChange={(e)=>{setForm('Name', e.target.value)}}/>
      </Form.Group>

      <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formBasicEmail">
        <Form.Label>Gender</Form.Label>
        <MyDropdown optionList={genderList} onChange={(e)=>{setForm('Gender', e.target.value)}}/>
      </Form.Group>

      <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formBasicEmail">
        <Form.Label>Phone No</Form.Label>
        <Form.Control type="number" placeholder="Phone No" onChange={(e)=>{setForm('Phone No', e.target.value)}}/>
      </Form.Group>

      <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formBasicEmail">
        <Form.Label>Blood Group</Form.Label>
        <MyDropdown optionList={bloodGroupList} onChange={(e)=>{setForm('Blood Group', e.target.value)}}/>
      </Form.Group>

      <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formBasicEmail">
        <Form.Label>Units</Form.Label>
        <Form.Control type="number" placeholder="Units" onChange={(e)=>{setForm('Units', e.target.value)}}/>
      </Form.Group>

      <Button variant="outline-light" type="submit">
        Add
      </Button>
    </Form>
  )
}
